document.full_text: ous-bois, france  - having built a dream life in france, raising five kids in a big suburban home, haitian lejesse sertile grew so tired of crime that he switched to the right and voted for nicolas sarkozy in a 2007 election.
document.title: france's sarkozy in corner as voters shun him
lines_and_colors: ous-bois, france  - having built a dream life in france, raising five kids in a big suburban home, haitian lejesse sertile grew so tired of crime that he switched to the right and voted for nicolas sarkozy in a 2007 election.
